response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your operations. Given its value to you, I understand it could be worth $15,000. Considering this, I am offering you the chance to purchase it for $12,000. This price reflects my commitment to finding a mutually beneficial solution while ensuring a fair return on my investment. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both our needs.", "product_price": 12000}
